name: Adfree Gelbooru w/ Dark Theme
description:
Whitelist the website in your adblocker first, then install this style! (this prevents site issues) Dark Theme is optional and can be deactivated in "customize settings" above.
Cleans a popular anime image catalogue website off all current ads and visual disturbances.
Also includes a few minor tweaks like a bigger page selection at the bottom.
additional_info:
Will be updated when new ads appear.
